title: Jessica Novak
overview: Jessica Novak is a hard-working, conscientious, talented field reporter who has a knack for turning human interest stories into news. Her boss, news director Max Kenyon, is a tough critic and skilled teacher. Jessica is aided by her sympathetic field crew consisting of cameraman Phil Bonelli and sound engineer Ricky Duran. In addition to her full-time job as a reporter, Jessica tries to lead a normal life as an intelligent, attractive modern liberated woman.
